wikipedia_page.main: James Clark Fulton McCrae (also spelt McRae, McRea, McCray and McCabe; 2 September 1894 – 3 September 1974) was a Scottish football player and manager. His brother was Scottish international player David McCrae.

response: *James McCrae (footballer) (1894–1974), Scottish football player and manager
While at St Mirren, McCrae also earned two caps for Scotland in 1929.Scotland player Davie McCrae, London Hearts Supporters Club His brother was fellow player James McCrae.
